subtitle: This is the perfect prepare-ahead dinner party dish. Serve with couscous or rice.

method.text: Place the chicken in a large, shallow non-metallic dish.

Combine the marinade ingredients in a screw-top jar, or large bowl. Mix together well. Pour over the chicken. Cover with cling film. Leave to marinate for at least 12 hrs or overnight in the fridge, turning once or twice.
Meanwhile, combine all the salsa ingredients. Season to taste. Keep well chilled until ready for use.
Preheat grill or a ribbed non-stick frying pan. Drain the chicken well and cook for 6-8 min each side or until cooked thoroughly. Serve with the tropical salsa.

title: Hawaiian chicken with tropical fruit salsa
